name: Oceanhorn: Monster of Uncharted Seas

files.setup: N/A:Please select the GOG Windows installer.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Oceanhorn - Monster of Uncharted Seas/Oceanhorn.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Please select the GOG Windows installer.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Oceanhorn - Monster of Uncharted Seas/Oceanhorn.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /NOCANCEL /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
